mapper.sql: USERID, GOODSNUM, GOODSNAME, QUANTITYOFGOODS, CONSIGNEE, CONSIGNEEADDRESS, CONSIGNEEPHONE, CREATETIME, LOGISTICS, LOGISTICSCOMPANY, SENDTAG, REMARK, GOLDSENDGOODS_ID
mapper.update:
update
set USERID = #{USERID}, GOODSNUM = #{GOODSNUM}, GOODSNAME = #{GOODSNAME}, QUANTITYOFGOODS = #{QUANTITYOFGOODS}, CONSIGNEE = #{CONSIGNEE}, CONSIGNEEADDRESS = #{CONSIGNEEADDRESS}, CONSIGNEEPHONE = #{CONSIGNEEPHONE}, CREATETIME = #{CREATETIME}, LOGISTICS = #{LOGISTICS}, LOGISTICSCOMPANY = #{LOGISTICSCOMPANY}, SENDTAG = #{SENDTAG}, REMARK = #{REMARK}, GOLDSENDGOODS_ID = GOLDSENDGOODS_ID where GOLDSENDGOODS_ID = #{GOLDSENDGOODS_ID}
mapper.insert:
insert into
( USERID, GOODSNAME, CONSIGNEE, CONSIGNEEADDRESS, CONSIGNEEPHONE, CREATETIME, GOODSNUM ) values ( #{userId}, #{goodsName}, #{consignee}, #{consigneeAddress}, #{consigneePhone}, now(), #{goodsNum} )
mapper.select: select s.USERID, s.GOODSNUM, s.GOODSNAME, s.QUANTITYOFGOODS, s.CONSIGNEE, s.CONSIGNEEADDRESS, s.CONSIGNEEPHONE, DATE_FORMAT(s.CREATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as CREATETIME, s.LOGISTICS, s.LOGISTICSCOMPANY, s.SENDTAG, s.REMARK, s.GOLDSENDGOODS_ID, p.IMGURL from as s left join TB_POINTSGOODS as p on s.GOODSNUM = p.GOODSNUM where USERID = #{userId} order by CREATETIME desc
